member.name: M:DeviceManager.LambdaGenPSManagerRS232.SetRemoteMode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the power supply to local or remote mode.
member.param: 0 - Local; 1 - Remote; 2 - Local lockout mode(latched remote mode)
